评论详情: Came really fast and fits perfectly! I went for a medium since that was recommended for me. The hoodie is really warm and has great quality (If this is helpful for anyone, I'm 5'3 and 120 pounds)

评论概述: Adorable, nice quality and fabric, washes well
评论详情: This was on my teen daughter’s Christmas list, I was hesitant to buy sight unseen but this is such a great hoodie! Nice and warm, cozy, thick, quality material, excellent fit and a beautiful jet black color. It washes well and is stylish. Cool teen approved.
